name: UpdateOrderDetails
description:
Update specific details of an order using its ID.

This tool performs a partial update of an order in HubSpot CRM, identified by the order's internal ID or a unique property value. Use it to modify existing order properties; read-only or non-existent properties cannot be updated and will cause errors. Properties can be cleared by providing empty values.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the order to be updated.

parameters.name: order_update_properties
parameters.description: JSON object with key-value pairs of order properties to update. Empty strings can clear property values.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of a unique property to identify the order object instead of using the order ID.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.
